titleStmt.title: The soules solace, or Thirtie and one spirituall emblems
titleStmt.author: Jenner, Thomas, fl. 1631-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: J. Dawson] Sold by Thomas Ienner, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: T.I., i.e. Thomas Jenner, to whom the whole is attributed.
Appears at reel 742, ł and at reel 1663, #4 (British Library copies).
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
